snippet: Authorities in Colorado broke up a drug trafficking ring and seized 55 pounds of methamphetamine, ending what prosecutors said on Monday was an audacious network that involved a food truck selling tacos "with a side of meth."...

headline.print_headline: Traffickers Sold Tacos With a 'Side of Meth': Colorado Prosecutors
headline.main: Traffickers Sold Tacos With a 'Side of Meth': Colorado Prosecutors

lead_paragraph: Authorities in Colorado broke up a drug trafficking ring and seized 55 pounds of methamphetamine, ending what prosecutors said on Monday was an audacious network that involved a food truck selling tacos "with a side of meth."
